translations: vt.（尤指为止血或防止感染对伤口进行）烧灼（cauterise的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I had to go to hospital to have my nose cauterised and treated.
sentences.translation: 我以前曾经去医院治疗过鼻子。

sentences.sentence: The cracks are already here in the economies and have been temporarily cauterised.
sentences.translation: 经济上已经出现了裂缝，只不过暂时消毒止血而已。

sentences.sentence: I had to go to hospital to have my nose cauterised and treated. kept being sick in the snail.
sentences.translation: 我以前曾经去医院治疗过鼻子。在蜗牛壳中我一直生病。
